title: Bowl, ca. 1860
markings: Marks: Stamped on silver handle with Netherlandish hall marks [see Notes].
description: 8-sided rectangular bowl, sides slightly flared, scalloped rim, sides cut with series of widely-spaced vertical lines; tall looped silver handle withshaped edges and engraved arabesques.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bowl, ca. 1860.
ca. 1860. glass, silver. Bequest of Walter Phelps Warren. 1986-61-81.
